00029 Clip::Clip (const Magick::Image &image, const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const unsigned int &height, const unsigned int &width)
00030     : image_(image)
00031 {
00032     try
00033     {
00034         // Associate a frame with the image
00035         frame_ = new Magick::Pixels(image_);
00036     }
00037     catch (std::exception &e)
00038     {
00039         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00040     }
00041     
00042     
00043     // Test the clip top left-most corner is inside the image
00044     if ( x >= image_.rows() or x < 0 )
00045     {
00046         delete frame_;
00047         throw NessieException ("In constructor Clip::Clip(): The X coordinate of clip's upper leftmost pixel is out of image borders");
00048     }
00049     else
00050         x_ = x;
00051     
00052     if ( y >= image_.columns() or y < 0 )
00053     {
00054         delete frame_;
00055         throw NessieException ("In constructor Clip::Clip(): The Y coordinate of clip's upper leftmost pixel is out of image borders");
00056     }
00057     else
00058         y_ = y;
00059     
00060         
00061     // Test the clip size is consistent with the image size
00062     if ( (x_ + height) > image_.rows() )
00063         height_ = image_.rows() - x_;
00064     else
00065         height_ = height;
00066     
00067     if ( (y_ + width) > image_.columns() )
00068         width_ = image_.columns() - y_;
00069     else
00070         width_ = width;
00071         
00072     
00073     try
00074     {
00075         // Initializes the pointer to the clip origin
00076         originPixel_ = frame_->get(x_, y_, width_, height_);
00077         
00078         // Convert the image into a grayscale mode
00079         image_.type(Magick::GrayscaleType);     
00080     }
00081     catch (std::exception &e)
00082     {
00083         delete frame_;
00084         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00085     }
00086 };

00095 Clip::~Clip ()
00096 {
00097     delete frame_;
00098 };

00135 void Clip::x (const unsigned int &x)
00136 {
00137     if ( x >= image_.rows() or x < 0 )
00138         throw NessieException ("Clip::xOrigin(const unsigned int &x): The X coordinate of clip's upper leftmost pixel is out of image borders");
00139     else
00140         x_ = x;
00141     
00142     adjustClipSize();
00143     relocateClipOrigin();
00144 };

00177     relocateClipOrigin();

00201 void Clip::height (const unsigned int &height)
00202 {
00203     if ( (x_ + height) > image_.rows() )
00204         height_ = image_.rows() - x_;
00205     else
00206         height_ = height;
00207     
00208     relocateClipOrigin();
00209 };

00232 void Clip::width (const unsigned int &width)
00233 {

00235         width_ = image_.columns() - y_;
00236     else
00237         width_ = width;
00238     
00239     relocateClipOrigin();
00240 };

00254 Pixel Clip::getPixel (const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y) const
00255 {
00256     // Check the location is inside the clip borders
00257     if ( (x >= height_) or (x < 0) )
00258         throw NessieException ("Clip::getPixel(const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y): The X coordinate is out of image borders");
00259     
00260     if ( (y >= width_) or (y < 0) )
00261         throw NessieException ("Clip::getPixel(const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y): The Y coordinate is out of image borders");
00262     
00263     // Get the pixel at desired location
00264     Magick::PixelPacket* selectedPixel = originPixel_ + (x * width_) + y;
00265     
00266     try
00267     {
00268         // Build a Pixel object with the pixel gray level
00269         Magick::ColorGray grayLevel(*selectedPixel);
00270         return Pixel(x, y, grayLevel.shade());
00271     }
00272     catch (std::exception &e)
00273     {
00274         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00275         return Pixel();
00276     }
00277 };

00279 
00292 void Clip::setPixel (const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const double &grayLevel)
00293 {
00294     try
00295     {
00296         // Ensure that there is only one reference to underlying image.
00297         // If this is not done, then image pixels will not be modified.
00298         image_.modifyImage();
00299     
00300         // Check the location is inside the clip borders
00301         if ( x >= height_ or x < 0 )
00302             throw NessieException ("Clip::setPixel(const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const double &grayLevel): The X coordinate is out of image borders");
00303 
00304         if ( y >= width_ or y < 0 )
00305             throw NessieException ("Clip::setPixel(const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const double &grayLevel): The Y coordinate is out of image borders");
00306 
00307         // Get the pixel at desired location
00308         Magick::PixelPacket* selectedPixel = originPixel_ + (x * width_) + y;
00309 
00310         // Assign the desired value to the pixel
00311         *selectedPixel = Magick::ColorGray(grayLevel);
00312 
00313         // Apply changes on the image
00314         frame_->sync();
00315     }
00316     catch (std::exception &e)
00317     {
00318         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00319     }
00320 };
00321 
00322 
00329 void Clip::relocateClipOrigin ()
00330 {
00331     try
00332     {       
00333         // Relocate the pointer to the clip new origin
00334         originPixel_ = frame_->get(x_, y_, width_, height_);
00335     }
00336     catch (std::exception &e)
00337     {
00338         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00339     }   
00340 };
00341 
00342 
00350 void Clip::adjustClipSize ()
00351 {
00352     if ( (y_ + width_) > image_.columns() )
00353         width_ = image_.columns() - y_;
00354     
00355     if ( (x_ + height_) > image_.rows() )
00356         height_ = image_.rows() - x_;
00357 };
